sub_title: Finance Business Partner, Benelux at AECOM (incorporating Davis Langdon, An AECOM Company)
summary:
Nationality: Russian and Dutch
Married to a Dutch citizen, two children

school.name: Moscow State University of Economics, Statistics and Informatics (MESI)

profile_positions.description:
Currently I combine a role of Finance Business Partner with a role of PA for projects with revenue above $0.5m for Benelux Region.

PA responsibilities:
-	Reviewing of projects operating under non-standard inter-company agreements
-	Reviewing quarterly projects performance, analyzing financial KPIs, risks, contingencies, meeting 
        compliancy standards, etc. 
-	Participating in month-end financial reporting (projects revenue adjustments, aged billed/unbilled 
        review, loss provisions, etc).

FBP responsibilities:
-	Providing best posible value-add to the Regional Finance Manager and operations departments.
-	Bringing insights, challenges and analysis from a finance perspective into the business decision 
        making process.
-	Delivering accurate and timely information contributing to business decisions by partners (End 
        Markets and Countries)
-	Managing Outlook updating process on monthly/quarterly basis
-	Coordinating and providing input for plan on an annual basis
-	Estimate and analyze MTD results on weekly basis tracking the variances in Utilization and Gross 
        Margin, aged billed/unbilled, SG&A, etc
-	Monthly reporting MMR, Cash, Billed/Unbilled/BIEE, reconcile Insight to Hyperion, report One Offs, 
        and other.
profile_positions.title: Finance Business Partner - Benelux Region

profile_positions.description: Part time responsibility. Monitoring to identify evolving risks and compliance with company regulation and policy. Collaborating across financial operations to mitigate identified risks or correct processes and strive to improve internal control performance. Monthly reporting CE projects risks, participate in yearly revenue recognition analysis in order to meet the compliance requirements, working with audits, etc.
profile_positions.title: CE Risk and Control Manager

profile_positions.description: Managing a team of Project Accountants located in Russia, Greece, Netherlands and Belgium covering more than 600 projects in 10 countries around Continental Europe. Monitoring and documenting the financial status of a company's projects and portfolios. Monthly overviewing the reports of Project Data Quality, Financial KPI, WIP, AR, FX Revaluation, Loss provision, Inter-company transactions and revenues. Participating in meetings on different levels. Personally, overseeing projects with a size above 10 million EUR with multi-countries project teams.
profile_positions.title: Regional Project Accountant Manager - Eastern Europe & Benelux

profile_positions.description: Managing a team of project accountants located in Russia, Turkey and Greece, covering more than 300 projects in Russia, Ukraine, Azerbaijan, Kazakhstan, Turkey, Greece, Belarus, Czech Republic.  Monitoring the projects KPI, financial estimates, progress results. Working close with all levels of project management in the region. Supporting internal and external audit. Taking part in Sage Accpac implementation in Czech Republic, providing training and project accounting support.
profile_positions.title: Regional Project Accountant Manager - Eastern Europe

profile_positions.description: Managing a team of project accountants covering about 150 projects in Russia and CIS countries. Working closely with project management to set up project cost estimates, tracking and analyzing the projects finance status, solving different kind of issues and at the end closing the projects in the system.  Playing active role in month end process with different kind of reporting including Utilization, Revenue, Forecasts, etc.
profile_positions.title: Account Project Manager - Russia and CIS

profile_positions.description: Establishing the project accounting system to Aecom standards for the Russian activities. Training project managers in use and compliance. Monitoring the projects finance results, assisting with the project estimates preparation. Monthly reporting on revenue, forecasts, cash collection, etc. Undertaking the role of Moscow project accountants’ team leader overseeing around 100 projects and working closely with PMs on project job costing estimates and project KPI monitoring.
profile_positions.title: Project Accountant

profile_positions.description: Working on big construction projects such as Construction of Park Hyuaming for Chinese investor in Moscow; Construction of the Russian headquarters and research center for Intel in Moscow; Construction of a greenfield factory on a 23 hectares plot to produce fracking agents, for US company Carbo Ceramics, provided services of Project Manager’s assistant and document controller, managing correspondence, meeting minutes, agenda, etc.
profile_positions.title: Assistant to Project Manager/Project Document Control
